newsitem.title: USA: Vmark sees Q4 EPS loss $0.01-$0.04 a share.
newsitem.headline: Vmark sees Q4 EPS loss $0.01-$0.04 a share.

text.p: Vmark Software Inc said on Monday it expects its fourth-quarter revenues to be flat, or about 4 percent below analysts' expectations, resulting in an operating loss of $0.01 to $0.04 per share for the quarter.
The company said increased sales and marketing expenses associated with the launch of its new data warehouse product, DataStage, were behind the shortfall in revenues.

The company also said it will sell its third party Novell education businesses, transfer the majority of its German subsidiary to Cincom Systems Inc and cut its workforce by 16 percent. The moves will result in an $8 million pre-tax charge in the company's fourth quarter, the company said.
